favourite.article: Praise The Lord! He alone can give us a beautiful heart.

Praise the Lord! We will be having the YP Blending Conference this Nov. 1-4, 2012 where in one of the activities is that we will have the hymn singing. We will teach new hymns to the young people...Hymns to enjoy with such truths...This hymn is one of the hymns we will teach such a prayer of consecration...Amen!
